item.title: Bright Memory: Infinite coming to iOS, Android on January 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/bright-memory-infinite-coming-to-ios-android-on-january-17

  • Smartphone

Currently available for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC.

FYQD-Studio will release first-person action game Bright Memory: Infinite for iOS and Android on January 17 for $4.99, the developer announced.

Bright Memory: Infinite is currently available for PC via Steam on November 11, 2021, followed by PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on July 21, 2022.

The iOS and Android versions are ported from the PC version, and support Xbox controllers, virtual button customization, gyroscope aiming, and a maximum of 120 frames per second output (Android only).
